definition.text: An asset node is the definition of an asset in Superalgos.

translations.text: Узел актива - это определение актива в Superalgos.

paragraphs.text: Assets defined under the Exchange Assets node may then be used to define markets, or to define holdings denominated in these assets under the User Assets node.
codeName is the ticker of the asset as listed by the exchange (i.e. BTC, BTH, ETH, LTC, BNB, USDT, USD, etc.)
When a configured asset is within the system's icon catalog, the standard asset icon is replaced with the logotype of the corresponding asset.
